SEARCH
Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.controllers

Class FlightController

java.lang.Object
com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.controllers.FlightController
@CrossOrigin("*") @RestController @RequestMapping("api/v1/flight") public class FlightController extends Object
Controller for managing flight-related operations such as creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting flights.

  • Method Details

    • createFlight

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Flight> createFlight(@RequestBody Flight flight)
      Creates a new flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight object to be created.
      Returns:
      the created flight.

    • getFlightById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Flight> getFlightById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight.
      Returns:
      the flight if found, otherwise 404.

    • getAllFlights

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Flight>> getAllFlights()
      Retrieves all flights.
      Returns:
      the list of all flights.

    • updateFlight

      @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Flight> updateFlight(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Flight flightDetails)
      Updates an existing flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight.
      flightDetails - the flight details to update.
      Returns:
      the updated flight.

    • deleteFlight

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteFlight(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight.
      Returns:
      a 204 response if deleted, otherwise 404.

    • cancelFlight

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/cancel") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> cancelFlight(@PathVariable Long id)
      Cancels a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be canceled.
      Returns:
      a response indicating whether the cancellation was successful.

    • delayFlight

      @PostMapping("/{id}/delay") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> delayFlight(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String newDepartureTime)
      Delays a flight by setting a new departure time.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be delayed.
      newDepartureTime - the new departure time for the flight in ISO-8601 format.
      Returns:
      a response indicating whether the delay was successful.

    • updateAvailability

      @PostMapping("/updateAvailability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateAvailability()
      Updates the availability of all flights based on their current status (e.g., past departure or no available seats).
      Returns:
      a response indicating whether the availability was successfully updated.

    • getFlightsByAirplaneType

      @GetMapping("/byAirplaneType") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Flight>> getFlightsByAirplaneType(@RequestParam EFlightAirplane airplaneType)
      Retrieves a list of flights by airplane type.
      Parameters:
      airplaneType - the type of airplane to filter flights.
      Returns:
      a list of flights with the specified airplane type.
